title: League Download Size and Saving Progress?
body: Hi, Im on a limited data plan and am wondering what the current size of the league client(or the league download size in general) is as of patch 7.15. Also, if I were to download a portion of the client, run out of data, close the client, shut down and come back a week later would the downloaded percentage save?

replies.body: Currently our client doesn't have a way to pause downloads or updates, but I can definitely feel the struggle you're going through :(. You might be able to have a little more success getting the client downloaded by going to a friends house or somewhere with public wifi if you can't get past your data cap.
